questions.question_text: Conducting a business impact analysis (BIA) BEST helps to identify:

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D. System criticality.

A business impact analysis (BIA) is a crucial step in the development of a comprehensive business continuity and disaster recovery plan. It helps organizations identify and prioritize their critical systems and processes by assessing the potential impacts of various disruptions on their operations. As part of the BIA process, system criticality is evaluated, which involves determining how essential each system or process is to the organization's overall functioning. This information helps organizations allocate resources and prioritize efforts to ensure the continuity of their most critical systems in the event of a disaster or disruption
